title: Barrage spells

properties.name: description
properties.value: Barrage spells are the strongest group of multi-target damaging Magic spells in the Ancient spellbook, and the strongest spell set overall. These spells hit up to nine targets in a 3x3 square area.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Barrage spells

Barrage spells are the strongest group of multi-target damaging Magic spells in the Ancient spellbook, and the strongest spell set overall. These spells hit up to nine targets in a 3x3 square area.

Icon Mobile
icon 		Spell Level Runes Base XP Max damage
(without bonuses)
Smoke Barrage 86 4 4 2 4 48 27
Shadow Barrage 88 4 2 4 3 49 28
Blood Barrage 92 4 4 1 51 29
Ice Barrage 94 6 2 4 52 30

rawContent:
{{External|rs}} '''Barrage spells''' are the strongest group of multi-target damaging [[Magic]] spells in the [[Ancient Magick|Ancient spellbook]], and the strongest spell set overall. These spells hit up to nine targets in a 3x3 square area. {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" !Icon ![[Mobile]]
icon !Spell !Level !Runes !Base XP !Max damage
(without bonuses) |- |[[File:Smoke Barrage.png]] |[[File:Smoke Barrage icon (mobile).png]] |[[Smoke Barrage]] |{{SCP|Magic|86}} |{{RuneReq|Blood=2|Death=4|Fire=4|Air=4}} |48 |27 |- |[[File:Shadow Barrage.png]] |[[File:Shadow Barrage icon (mobile).png]] |[[Shadow Barrage]] |{{SCP|Magic|88}} |{{RuneReq|Air=4|Soul=3|Blood=2|Death=4}} |49 |28 |- |[[File:Blood Barrage.png]] |[[File:Blood Barrage icon (mobile).png]] |[[Blood Barrage]] |{{SCP|Magic|92}} |{{RuneReq|Death=4|Blood=4|Soul=1}} |51 |29 |- |[[File:Ice Barrage.png]] |[[File:Ice Barrage icon (mobile).png]] |[[Ice Barrage]] |{{SCP|Magic|94}} |{{RuneReq|Death=4|Blood=2|Water=6}} |52 |30 |} ==Gallery== Smoke Barrage.gif|Smoke Barrage Shadow Barrage.gif|Shadow Barrage Blood Barrage.gif|Blood Barrage Ice Barrage.gif|Ice Barrage {{Combat spells}} {{Ancient Magicks}}
